titleStmt.title: Three miseries of Barbary: plague. famine. ciuill warre With a relation of the death of Mahamet the late Emperour: and a briefe report of the now present wars betweene the three brothers.
titleStmt.author: Wilkins, George, fl. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. I[aggard] for Henry Gosson, and are to be sold in Pater noster rowe at the signe of the Sunne,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass.
